ZipRecruiter | https://ziprecruiter.com | Santa Monica (LA area) | REMOTE in United States OK for some positions. ONSITE for most.

Our goal is to create the best online services for filling and finding jobs. We bootstrapped for the first four years, growing to 900+ employees (190 are software engineers). Last month we raised $156M Series B Funding!

We have a number of open positions: - Senior Perl Developer (Santa Monica or Remote) - Senior Python Software Engineer (Santa Monica) - Senior DevOps Engineer (Santa Monica) - Senior Go Developer (Santa Monica) - Software Engineer (Entry-level) (Santa Monica) - and much more!

Please check out our careers page, ziprecruiter.com/careers, for all our open tech positions.

We're growing rapidly and have a large customer base (primarily small and medium-sized businesses). We have interesting problems to solve in the areas of search, yield management, analytics, scalability, and new product development.

If you'd like to learn more, please visit https://www.ziprecruiter.com/hiring/technology or email us at techjobs@ziprecruiter.com.
